body: Note for team: we should do this for 9 to avoid a break afterwards.

issue.title: Map directly to JSON id for types converted to string

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Fixes #34554

I also needed to fix #34511 to make this work. This was happening because we were removing the by-convention property added by property discovery. We only need to remove it when it's the computed property as well, which is handled by the other case.

issue.title: [release/9.0] Map directly to JSON id for types converted to string

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Fixes #34554

Port of #34564

I intended this code for 9. Here it is. Merge it if you want.

Peace. Out. Most of it was fun.
